column4: k i have a really random question: on my site i have several icons at the bottom linking to various things, valid XHTML (link to validator) Valid CSS (ditto) Firefox (link to dl it) apache (link to their homepage) and a linux icon, but what should i link that to?  what is the "home page" of linux
you might want to use the FSF instead of Linux
i think they actually have web buttons and other branding to use
